# External Resources (Integration)

Use this section to capture relevant details from external links (vendor docs, libraries, whitepapers) in your own words, and cite sources. Avoid copying large blocks verbatim for licensing reasons.

Suggested sources:
- FTC Docs: https://ftc-docs.firstinspires.org/
- FTC SDK Javadoc: https://javadoc.io/doc/org.firstinspires.ftc
- REV Hardware Client and Hubs docs
- RoadRunner documentation
- Pedro pathing documentation
